13.Name: NWN2 Game Trailer
13.Author: Obsidian Entertainment
13.Description: Official trailer for NWN2 running a few minutes in quicktime format with no voice over.

14.Name: NWN2 Unofficial Trailer
14.Author: nobody-special
14.Description: This is just a little movie I put together with a Movie making program I have.

15.Name: Obsidian Entertainment Video Interview
15.Author: IGN
15.Description:
General interview with Obsidian Entertainment's CEO Feargus Urquhart running 12 minutes, which talks about the direction of the company and working with various Intellectual Properties. He also speaks about RPGs in general and what makes a good one. How to balance Diablo versus Planescape and not fall into the trap of not making the same type of games.

He then talks about their three products which is NWN2 and two unannounced console games. For NWN2 he mentions that the development is coming along great, and about the large amount of work that went into the toolset. One of the really cool comments is that there will be a lot of access to the engine to create whole new interfaces which include popup interfaces and he made a comparison to a total conversion.

He then concludes about managing a large company and how it's affected development. He also gives advice on how to get into the gaming industry.

17.Name: NWN2 Demo Movie
17.Author: IGN
17.Description: IGN has posted a video commentary with Obsidian CEO Feargus Urquhart with the entire direct-feed footage of the entire demo and is broken up into three parts. The first part is on the game intro and character creation. The second part covers the game tutorial, the graphics engine, and companions. The last part gets into the tool Set, interiors, combat, and magic.

18.Name: GTtv NWN2 Pre-E3 Demo
18.Author: GameTrailers.com
18.Description: Video footage from GTtv featuring interview with Obsidian CEO Feargus Urquhart. Lots of good footage to check out. Thanks to spinoza76 for the heads up.

19.Name: GameSpot NWN2 Pre-E3 Demo
19.Author: GameSpot
19.Description: GameSpot has posted a video interview (wmv) with Obsidian CEO Feargus Urquhart done at a recent pre-E3 event where they talk about the game but also includes some good gameplay footage not seen in the IGN video of yesterday. Definitely check it out.

21.Name: GameSpot NWN2 Gameplay Trailer
21.Author: GameSpot
21.Description: Gameplay video showing combat and some dialog running 1'57" and available in Hi-Res: 52.9MB and Lo-Res: 23.8MB versions.

22.Name: IGN NWN2 Gameplay Videos
22.Author: IGN
22.Description: Two gameplay videos added on 5/11/06 showing some gameplay combat as well as a character entering a crypt and the famous city shot where the camera pulls away from close to far out.

23.Name: GameSpot NWN2 Stage Show Demo
23.Author: GameSpot
23.Description: GameSpot has posted a video of an interview conducted with Feargus Urquhart, CEO of Obsidian at E3 on the basics of NWN2 plus news of a beta release of the toolset for certain members of the community.

24.Name: Gametactics.com
24.Author: Justin Lee
24.Description: Video interview with Obsidian's QA Tester, Patrick Mills on a variety of subjects.

25.Name: Gamestar.de NWN2 E3 video
25.Author: Gamestar.de
25.Description: 3 minute video from E3 done in German showing some gameplay footage from NWN2. Mostly the tutorial section and a scene from the Hall of Seasons

26.Name: NWN2 Toolset Demo - Area Overview
26.Author: Obsidian
26.Description:
This is a demo rotating around one area from the game that was recently featured in official screenshots released by Obsidian.

Special thanks to Obsidian toolset guru, Scott Everts for his help in getting the footage.

27.Name: NWN2 Toolset Demo - Raise and Lower Ground
27.Author: Obsidian
27.Description: This demo will show how you can raise and lower the ground in small changes using a brush. Another video will show how to do extreme hills.

28.Name: NWN2 Toolset Demo - Painting Textures
28.Author: Obsidian
28.Description: This video shows how you can paint textures on top of each other up to six per exterior tile area.

29.Name: NWN2 Toolset Demo - Painting Water
29.Author: Obsidian
29.Description: This video shows how easy it is to paint down water in the toolset. You can select your brush size as well as tinting and much more.

30.Name: NWN2 Toolset Demo - Raise / Lower Water
30.Author: Obsidian
30.Description: This video shows how easy it is to raise or lower water. You simply use an eyedropper and pick a point where you'd like the water to go.

31.Name: NWN2 Toolset Demo - Select Walls
31.Author: Obsidian
31.Description: This video shows how the walls surrounding the keep in the area are composed of many smaller pieces which you can stack and there are even some very large walls as well, though not shown in the video.

32.Name: NWN2 Tooleset Demo - Moving Boulders
32.Author: Obsidian
32.Description: Demo showing moving boulders and trees into place.

33.Name: NWN2 Toolset Demo - Tinting
33.Author: Obsidian
33.Description: Many objects have up to three tint controls and the demo shows modifying a house.

34.Name: NWN2 Toolset Demo - Boulder Preview
34.Author: Obsidian
34.Description: Demo showing an assortment of the boulders available from small to very large.

35.Name: NWN2 Toolset Demo - Buildings
35.Author: Obsidian
35.Description: Demo showing a small assortment of buildings both in a normal and burned out state.

36.Name: NWN2 Toolset Demo - Steep Hills
36.Author: Obsidian
36.Description: Demo showing creating very steep hills and then smoothing them out.

37.Name: NWN2 Toolset Video - Resize Fort
37.Author: Obsidian
37.Description: Demo showing resizing the fort building to very large and then very small.

38.Name: NWN2 Toolset Demo - Cycle Day/Night
38.Author: Obsidian
38.Description: Demo showing the different cycle presets in the toolset. You can adjust the lighting for each.

39.Name: NWN2 Toolset Demo - Creating Interior Room
39.Author: Obsidian
39.Description: Demo showing creating an interior room in the toolset where you place each tile piece.

40.Name: NWN2 Toolset Demo - Adding Table
40.Author: Obsidian
40.Description: Demo showing adding a table to a room

41.Name: NWN2 Toolset Demo - Candelabra Prefab
41.Author: Obsidian
41.Description: Demo showing all the pieces of a canelabra prefab and placing it on a table.

42.Name: NWN2 Toolset Demo - Table Prefab
42.Author: Obsidian
42.Description: Demo showing a table prefab and rotating it as a group.

43.Name: NWN2 Toolset Demo - Prefab Tinting
43.Author: Obsidian
43.Description: Demo showing tinting a prefab made of several pieces as a group

44.Name: Neverwinter Nights 2 - Toolset been used video
44.Author: Claudio Villa
44.Description:
A compilation of 18 short videos showing the new NWN2 toolset features. 

It�s possible to see the terrain been raised and lowered, the way the water can be paintedm textures and tinting of some placeables

45.Name: NWN2 Developer Diary #1
45.Author: Obsidian
45.Description: Thanks to Bruno for pointing out the first NWN2 developer diary in movie format (28mb .wmv) hosted at g4mers.com. The movie runs about 4 minutes and features an introduction by Obsidian CEO Feargus Urquhart and then is followed by Tramell Isaac, Lead Artist, who talks about models and gives a detailed look at the Red Dragon. Lead Designer, Josh Sawyer then takes over and talks about the 3.5 rules as well as Prestige Classes.

46.Name: G4mers.com NWN2 Video Interview
46.Author: G4mers.com
46.Description:
G4mers.com has posted an exclusive video interview with Obsidian's CEO Feargus Urquhart on NWN2. It was conducted at E3 and runs 13mins, covering such topics as how Obsidian got involved in NWN2, story goals, comparisions to Oblivion, bard skills, the warlock class, music, the modding community and more.

One interesting note that Feargus mentioned is that while he didn't mention the music composer, he did say he enjoyed the work on Fallout and that of music composer, Mark Morgan, though that might be reading way too much in his comments. Thanks to Bruno from G4mers.com for the heads up.

47.Name: NWN2 Demo At ComicCon
47.Author: NWN2 Warcry / RaDSaM
47.Description: NWN2 Warcry has posted a video and a few screenshots, including a sample of the world map, taken at the ComicCon presentation taken by RaDSaM. The video runs 24mins and is 120MB, featuring scenes from the toolset including quite a bit of gameplay with narration from members of Obsidian including CEO Feargus Urquhart and Lead Designer, Josh Sawyer. Thanks to Kalia for posting news of it at this forum thread.

48.Name: NWN2 PC User Magazine
48.Author: NWN2 Wiki / Pstarky
48.Description: Video from PC User Magazine in Australia showing the demo similar to those presented at E3 2006, which starts with the character creation, the shows some gameplay footage. Runs 6 mins. approx.

49.Name: NWN2 Gen Con 2006 videos
49.Author: Alec Usticke
49.Description:
Three short videos from Gen Con Indianapolis 2006:

 1. A snippet of a conversation from the NWN2 official campaign tutorial.
 2. The opening scene from the NWN2 official campaign tutorial.
 3. A brief snippet of combat from the NWN2 official campaign.

50.Name: NWN2 GenCon Seige Video
50.Author: cdaulepp
50.Description: These videos are all of the Keep that Lord Nasher gives you. In them you see a whole bunch of different Undead creatures attacking your keep. You have an army of defenders appear in your party bar on the right hand side of the screen and you see the siege equipment landing on your keep's walls as you attempt to throw the defenders down, kill them, and destroy the siege equipment. It's really quite cool.

51.Name: NWN2 Gameplay Trailer
51.Author: Obsidian
51.Description: Gameplay trailer released by Atari on Aug. 14th 2006 featuring fighting scenes from Neverwinter Nights 2. Quicktime format running 1:33mins. I would strongly recommend to download the quicktime as the quality is much higher but I've uploaded the video to YouTube for those that want instant gratification.

52.Name: NWN2 GenCon Toolset Video
52.Author: Lord Niah
52.Description:
Three videos of the toolset animation viewer by Lord Niah and uploaded by NWN2 Wiki:

 1. Night shade
 2. Orc
 3. Red dragon

54.Name: NWN2 GameSpy Gameplay Video
54.Author: Obsidian
54.Description: Hi-res videos of combat, siege and spell action from Neverwinter Nights 2.

55.Name: IGN Neverwinter Nights 2 Dev Video Interview
55.Author: Obsidian
55.Description: IGN has posted a new Neverwinter Nights 2 developer video interview with Chris Avellone, Senior Designer and co-founder of Obsidian. Topics of the interview cover what they've been doing lately, how the strongholds work and interweaves some gameplay. It runs approx. 4mins 15sec and is available in various formats though the downloadable hi-res versions require subscription. Thanks to Andy Eddy for the heads up. If you have 4 mins, it's definitely worth checking out. :)

56.Name: NWN2 video interview
56.Author: GameTrailers
56.Description: GameTrailers.com has posted an interview with Atari's senior producer Jon Galloway. There are a few gameplay scenes and parts of the official trailer, though nothing new. He mentions that there are over 200 new spells added.

57.Name: Neverwinter Nights 2 Designer Diary #2
57.Author: GameSpot
57.Description: GameSpot has posted the second Neverwinter Nights 2 Designer Diary with Darren Monahan, Obsidian's Executive Producer for NWN2, on the topic of creating cinematic worlds. Also there's a video for registered users talking about the efforts to give users control to create worlds and shows off quite a bit of the toolset.

58.Name: Neverwinter Nights 2 GenCon
58.Author: Jdia / Twigster
58.Description: A 10min video featuring Obsidian CEO Feargus Urquhart showing how to do lighting effects in the toolset for Neverwinter Nights 2.

60.Name: Pool of Radiance Remastered
60.Author: Markus "Wayne" Schlegel
60.Description:
Markus "Wayne" Schlegel, the author of the A Hunt through the Dark series has formed a team to create his own interpretation of the mother of all AD&D computer roleplaying games: THE POOL OF RADIANCE. They plan to split the
legendary story of ssi's classic into 4 chapters with many details, roleplaying elements and deep atmosphhere.

The first trailer shows some of the concept art of the project

More to come with the release of NWN2

61.Name: The Planescape Trilogy - Purgatorio Teaser Trailer
61.Author: Rogue Dao Studios
61.Description:
This is the teaser trailer for the upcoming first installment of the Planescape Trilogy.

The first volume of the trilogy is named PT: Purgatorio, and will provide 15+ hours of roleplaying entertainment for the NWN2 platform.

More information can be found at our website: Link

The lo-resolution windows media format is available now. A high-resolution version will be uploaded soon.

62.Name: NWN2 - The Lynncairen Saga - Trailer
62.Author: Alex "Hugie" Hugon
62.Description:
NWN2 - The Lynncairen Saga - Trailer

This is the (relatively boring) trailer for my Neverwinter Nights 2 single player module series, 'The Lynncairen Saga'. It's basically, in the words of an earlier poster, "4.5 minutes of...text!?!"--it's the series 'description' in movie form along with some mood-setting music. Towards the end, the music changes to the series' theme song, and the series logo is revealed--ooh, ahh. ;) Oh, and trust me, the series is going to be of much higher quality than this movie--I'm a story-writer and mod-builder, not a cinematic expert. Still, this gets the job done.
ETA is Early 2007. Direct questions, comments or flames to alex@hugon.com .


Credits:

Pink Floyd (music)
Kitaro (music)
Cowface (artwork)

63.Name: NWN2 Designer Diary #3 movie
63.Author: Obsidian
63.Description: Designer diary with Obsidian's Chris Avellone talking about companions, the camera, and more

64.Name: Making of - an Area
64.Author: Marcelo_Lopes
64.Description:
If you are lost about designing exteriors in NWN2 Toolset, seeing this video may help.

It shows many used tools during the process where I made an area.

65.Name: Neverwinter Nights 2 Designer Diary #4
65.Author: Obsidian
65.Description: A new Neverwinter Nights 2 diary movie shows off the scripting system in the upcoming D&D RPG sequel, narrated by Brian Fox and Charles Mead of Obsidian Entertainment.

66.Name: Neverwinter Nights 2 Video Preview at G4TV
66.Author: G4TV
66.Description: There's a new video preview at G4TV from their X-Play show covering Neverwinter Nights 2. The video doesn't have a dedicated link so you may have to search for it if it goes off their front page. The video features gameplay and commentary on the game. Thanks to spinoza76 for the heads up at this thread.

67.Name: Asylum - Trailer #2
67.Author: Christian Mayr
67.Description:
Sex, Drugs and Rock'n'Roll!

Ladies and gentlemen,

he's new, he's pretty ugly and he's awfully shy. Please don't point at him and laugh. He'll introduce himself very well - silence and pay attention: 

"Hello classmates! I know I'm ugly! I know I'm shy! And do you know why? (Wow, a rhyme!)

My creator didn't care much about designing trailers. He is more into this dialog-, character-, designthingy. In fact he's having hot sex with Mr. Design Document (There's no denying - last time both of you were a little bit *too* naked to be *just* best friends) the whole day long while neglecting all his fabulous trailers! So we are sitting here in the corner and are dying slowly. Just like a beautiful plant without water. I should stop wallowing in self-pitty, right? Okay.

Hello classmates! I'm Asylum's second trailer! And although I'm pretty ugly I'm representing something very beautiful! Isn't it strange?

...

Stop!

...

Stop it!

...

Stop pointing at me!

...

Stop laughing!"

Ladies and gentlemen,

you weren't listening to my orders. I guess I'll have to discipline every single boy and girl in class: Download and view Asylum's second trailer! This should be punishment enough!

---

Links:

Asylum - Trailer #1: http://nwvault.ign.com/View.php?view=Movies.Detail&id=68132&id=498
Asylum - Project Page: http://www.gor.at/asylum/

Composition (Yiddish Dances - IV. Freylachs) presented by Anderson Military Band: http://www.soundclick.com/bands/pagemusic.cfm?bandID=418665

68.Name: Neverwinter Nights 2: Monster Manual Volume One
68.Author: Jclef
68.Description:
This movie contains some of the monsters in their natural habitat from NWN2.

Hope you enjoy! =)

Google Video Link:

http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=4286660035989749950

69.Name: Neverwinter Nights 2: Monster Manual Volume Two
69.Author: Jason S. Roy
69.Description:
This movie contains some of the monsters in their natural habitat from NWN2.

Hope you enjoy! =)

Google Video Link:

http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=6353624673881374026

70.Name: Neverwinter Nights 2: Monster Manual Volume Three
70.Author: Jason S. Roy
70.Description:
This movie contains some of the monsters in their natural habitat from NWN2.

Hope you enjoy! =)

Google Video Link:

http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=1844950315073251350

71.Name: Neverwinter Nights 2 Environments
71.Author: Obsidian
71.Description: GameSpot has posted a new official movie where Obsidian lead environmental artist, Tim Donley, talks about the work that went into making both the exterior and interior levels be as realistic and immersive as possible.

72.Name: Neverwinter Nights 2 - Neverending Daze
72.Author: Obsidian (Adam Freese and Tawmis Logue)
72.Description:
From the duo (Adam Freese and Tawmis Logue) that brought us the humorous Neverending Nights, which chronicles the misadventures of two wayward travelers in the world of Neverwinter Nights, comes a new machinima project developed using the toolset for the upcoming Neverwinter Nights 2 - Neverending Daze.

Neverending Daze features 250% more misadventure, as we follow a party of five misfit protagonists attempting to conquer dungeons, slay fel beasts and abscond with their treasure.

Following are the first two episodes of Neverending Daze. Enjoy!

73.Name: IGN First Impressions NWN2
73.Author: IGN
73.Description: Here are four gameplay videos from IGN based on their first impressions of NWN2. They feature two town fights, one wilderness fight, and a blade golem video. The videos come in two formats and two sizes though the larger sizes require registration.

74.Name: Neverwinter Nights 2 Designer Diary #6
74.Author: Obsidian
74.Description: Strategy Informer has posted the sixth developer video diary for Neverwinter Nights 2 covering more on the stronghold feature narrated by Tony Evans, Senior Designer for NWN2. He talks about how players can build their castles using the townfolk, get quests, gold and much more. Thanks to Jamie Davey from Strategy Informer for the heads up.

75.Name: Pool of Radiance Remastered
75.Author: Markus 'Wayne' Schlegel
75.Description:
Markus "Wayne" Schlegel, the author of the A Hunt through the Dark series has formed a team to create his own interpretation of the mother of all AD&D computer roleplaying games: THE POOL OF RADIANCE. They plan to split the
legendary story of ssi's classic into 4 chapters with many details, roleplaying elements and deep atmosphere.

The idea to the second trailer was brought up in our discussion group at

http://nwn2forums.bioware.com/forums/myviewtopic.html?topic=508268&forum=111

I hope you like what we made of it.



More to come with the release of NWN2

76.Name: Life of Starianna Lailyndor
76.Author: Auramin
76.Description:
So this is what happens when Auramin gets bored. He starts creating either odd pieces of artwork OR teasers for his characters. 

This character, Starianna Lailyndor, is meant for the PW world The Frontier.

77.Name: SAGA 2 Teaser Video
77.Author: Fu'Miga
77.Description:
The SAGA Project proudly brings you the first teaser for the upcoming SAGA NWN2 PW called: The Fangii Schism. You should head to sagathian.com to read and know more... be part of this friendship based roleplay community. 

http://sagathian.com

78.Name: SAGA: Presentation Video #1
78.Author: Fu'Miga
78.Description:
This is the first of SAGA's presentation videos built to let players meet first hand the lands they will be able to explore in SAGA: The Fangii Schism. Here you will meet Ashport.

Article link: http://www.sagathian.com/saga-nwn2-pw/the-world/preview-1-ashport.html

This is the first world preview that I'm happy to bring to you all. This article will cover Ashport (specially the docks area) and we are sure that you will love the content we bring you.

Here you will find history, screenshots, a presentation video and we are sure you will get your mouth droolling for more!

80.Name: Preview: Eiseninsel Anmeldung
80.Author: Eiseninsel
80.Description:
Ein kurzes Ingamevideo soll einen fl�chtigen Eindruck zum Anmeldesystem geben. Die Dateigr��e der .wmv betr�gt ca. 7 MB. Viel Spa� damit.

---

Weitere Infos zur Eiseninsel: www.eiseninsel.de

81.Name: NWN2 Official Trailer
81.Author: Atari
81.Description: Atari has released a new official trailer for Neverwinter Nights 2 that shows a ton of action scenes and looks great.

82.Name: Rogue Dao Studios: Purgatorio Campaign Trailer
82.Author: Rogue Dao Studios
82.Description:
We've got a preview of the Hive Ward in a new trailer on our website (and soon to be on the Vault as well).

The trailer depicts a variety of cutscenes you will encounter, characters you will interact with and areas you will explore in the Hive Ward in the first act of Purgatorio campaign.

Four potential party companions are depicted in the trailer, we'll leave it to you guys to figure out which ones.

The trailer is large, so downloading it will take a little time. If you prefer to save it to your hard drive, you can right-click and save as, rather than waiting for it to load into the embedded player.

There is no voice-over as of yet, because we haven't gotten to the post-production part of the process.

All of the in-game cutscenes will be fully voiced-over in the finally released campaign.

The graphics settings have to be kept pretty low for full motion screen capture, so, depending on your system specs, the content will look substantially better in-game.

The trailer requires the DivX codec found here:

Link

The two tracks in the trailer are by Rogue Dao composers Kevin "Gopher" Chow and OldBrian.

If anyone has any questions about the content of the trailer, the processes used to produce it, or just about the Purgatorio campaign in general, I'd be glad to answer them on our forums.

-Monty

83.Name: Neverending Daze - Episode 01 - FRENCH SUBTITLE
83.Author: FNBH Productions
83.Description: Neverending Daze - Episode 01 - This video has French Subtitles embedded into the video.

85.Name: COC Intro
85.Author: neverguard
85.Description:
Ok this is the first time i submited stuff becaues of password porblems :)
any ways this is the intro to my mod i will be making soon. In joy!!

86.Name: Dungeonland Teaser Released!
86.Author: Cerebral_Monkey
86.Description:
Inspired by Gary Gygax's module of the same name, and The Land Beyond the Magic Mirror, Dungeonland seeks to recreate the same dangerous, whimsical world shaded beyond the veils of traditional fantasy.

To open the teaser, you will need a DivX player, or codec.

Music by Bill Brown. Video by Bruno Ljustina. 

Be sure to watch my blog for further updates. Website coming soon.

http://stupidmemoirs.blogspot.com

87.Name: SAGA: Presentation Video#2
87.Author: Fu'Miga
87.Description: This is the second of SAGA's presentation videos built to let players meet first hand the lands they will be able to explore in SAGA: The Fangii Schism. Here you will meet Misty Isle.

88.Name: Amdir - German PW Trailer
88.Author: Patsy
88.Description: Trailer for the NWW2 based persistent world Amdir.

89.Name: SAGA: Presentation Video #3
89.Author: Fu'Miga
89.Description:
This is the third of SAGA's presentation videos built to let players meet first hand the lands they will be able to explore in SAGA: The Fangii Schism, a NWN2 PW. Here you will meet your doom... the afterlife!
We all know that one of the most important parts of a Persistent World is how it handles the way a character dies and reborns. The death systems a PW uses is often a target of criticism and because of this our project decided to query the members on how to handle this.
After endless discussions we finally have the death systems figured out and being finished by our scripter: SpectralHare.

90.Name: Cielos Oscuros PW Demo Menelya Dur
90.Author: Qkrch
90.Description:
This is a video showing the main city of the Cielos Oscuros PW named Menelya Dur. It is a demo with music where is show what you can do with only 2 areas and some work with this great nwn2 toolset.

Hope you enjoy it as we'll do the same in a near future

Soundtrack - Dufay Collective - A l'estampida

More info on cielos oscuros webpage http://www.cielososcuros.com

92.Name: NWN 2 Sexy
92.Author: RQScott
92.Description: Did you ever visit the "Schwarze Orchidee" on Eiseninsel? You should try it. ;)

95.Name: Die Eiseninsel - Trailer I.
95.Author: RQScott
95.Description: First Trailer of the german nwn2-pw "Die Eiseninsel" - Link

96.Name: Cielos Oscuros PW Demo 2 Dedicated
96.Author: Qkrch
96.Description:
Videodemo 2 from the PW Cielos Oscuros showing some of the starting areas with a good music to enjoy the footage.

I want to dedicate this video to my mappers, they will feel strong to keep working under my whip. Thanks a lot mates!

Resolution 750x560 , needed XVID video codec to play it (not in youtube)

Note: ey, vote this video if you like it, you don't have to install it.. just watch it, rate and comment it :)

97.Name: Asylum - Trailer #3
97.Author: Christian Mayr
97.Description:
woha!

it's me again. presenting new stuff. let me tell you a story. a story about a town. a town and scarecrows. and demanding queens. and death and nightmares. and character design. and character design. and traits. in fact an auction of traits. and character design. and about chocolate mountains. and about a castle of knowledge. and about so much other stuff. oh... and trailers saying nothing. pretty ugly trailers saying nothing. trailers which are even pretty ugly compared to movies of the most ugly people in the world doing pretty ugly stuff like doing ugly gymnastics on and with their ugly bodies while watching ugly r-rated movies on their ugly television sold by the most ugly salesman in the world while attending a contest for the most ugly person watching ugly movies sold by ugly salesman where the most ugly salesman are judging for the most ugly non-salesman in the entire world (which became ugly because of all these ugly people attending ugly beauty contests) which will be broadcasted only by the most ugly tv-stations sending their ugly tv-shows which can only be viewed on ugly tv-sets like the ugly tv-set of the ugly guy with his ugly teeth attending this contest because of his ugly face and his ugly eyes, blah... ugly, ugly, ugly and now i have no idea what i wanted to write about but anyway... the trailer is ugly, but "a corpse, a vote" isn't supposed to be, so it will take till summer to get a release. if i'd release it today results would be pretty ugly. just have a look at the ugly trailer and you know what i'm talking about. but in a few months it will invite all inhabitants of nwvault to a big "RELEASE DAY!!!"-party proving that it lost it's last piece of ugliness long time ago. but... wohooo!... anyway, feel free to comment, vote, rate, and / or kill me for this piece of junk i'm donating as ticket for asylum's "a corpse, a vote" pre-pre-pre-pre-pre-pre-pre-pre-release-party. which will be pretty ugly.

in some other news i should get some sleep. that would be nice. and not ugly at all.

98.Description: Video of Blackstone Keep II, a PW for NWN2

99.Name: El Norte, la Frontera Salvaje
99.Author: Dagget
99.Description:
Video promocional del mundo persistente El Norte, la Frontera Salvaje.
Unete a la comunidad en: Link

100.Name: Ankhalas Hernden (Character story)
100.Author: Ankhalas
100.Description:
Este es el primer video de la historia de mi personaje de rol del PW Profecías de Candelero. En un futuro se sacarán videos con eventos del servidor. Soy nuevo realizando esta clase de videos =)

This is the first video of my character's story. Ankhalas will play in a PW named Profecias de Candelero, so in future my videos will be related about the events of that pwc. Im just new at making videos of Nwn2 =)

101.Name: Epiteorn
101.Author: Sahor
101.Description:
Voici le premier trailer du futur monde persistant : Epiteorn.

__________

This is the first trailer for my future PW : Epiteorn.

102.Name: Jasperre's NWN2 AI - Demo - Formations
102.Author: Jasperre
102.Description:
This demonstrates progress I've made in formations for NWN2. This means you don't get your own party members pushing each other out of the way to get to you, or being cumbersome to protect certain party members in and out of battles.

The framework is still progressing, even if the code is there its not in any easy to use state yet (and the leader must always be the PC), so suggestions on this and other AI-related things are very much welcome at my AI guild - Link

The creature formations will hopefully be applicable to all types of things, such as NPC squads of troops, NPC adventuring parties, and setting up groups of your own party which can act upon separate automated orders (like defending a point, or ambushing the enemy), rather then a PC being led to believe that NPC's are simply there to follow like sheep. :)

I'll try and demo some more interesting things when I finish them.

Download is an AVI XVid or DivX file and might need the latest codec download to view them. They are both the same video.

107.Name: NWN2 Stealth Animations
107.Author: Obsidian
107.Description: So, the contents of this 3 MB RAR file you will need to download might give you a smile, or it might not. Based on your requests, we are working on something - in fact the object of the video is a work in progress - and I just wanted to show you that we are listening to you. The video was smuggled out of our development labs by a crack team of gnomish commandos, so the quality isn't that great, but I think you will get the picture. There are many more things in the works...

109.Name: SIMAON, Les Cités Jumelles [trailer]
109.Author: Zach le bon
109.Description:
Bande-annonce du module persistant pour NWN2 : SIMAON, Les Cités Jumelles.
 
 Vidéo en Haute qualité sur Link
 
 ---
 Si vous aimez les balades champêtres, l'eau qui coule avec ravissement entre les racines d'arbres millénaires, le clapotis de la vague roulant le galet sur les plages, le bruissement léger du vent dans les feuilles des arbres.
 Ne regardez pas cette vidéo, c'est une horreur!
 Par contre si le fracas des lames ravit vos sens. Qu'un déluge de sort vous met en émoi. Que, pour vous, rien n'égale la saveur de la vision d'un Gobelours écrasant un crane de garde Lomannais. Que l'époque et l'épique, sonnent mieux à vos oreilles que les pics et les pocs de l'eau dans les arbres. Que les dédales sombres et cruels réveillent en vous des désirs d'embuscades. Que secrètement vous jubilez à l'évocation d'une femme qui court...
 Cette vidéo est pour vous.
 ---
 Boodchoo, orateur à ses heures...
 
 
 ============
 Trailer of the Persistant World for NWN2: SIMAON, The Twin Towns.
 
 Video in Hight Quality on Link
 
 ---
 (poor traduction, sorry)
 If you like the rural strolls, the water which pours with delight between the roots of trees millenniums, the lapping of the wave rolling the pebble on beaches, light rustle of the wind into the leaves of trees.
 Do not look at this video, it is a horror!
 On the other hand if the crash of blades delights your senses. That a torrent of spell puts you in emotion. That, for you, nothing equals the flavour of the vision of Gobelours crushing guard Lomannais's crane. That the period and the epic, ring better at your ears than "pic" and "poc" of the water in trees. That the dark and cruel mazes wake in you desires of ambushes. That secretly you exult in the evocation of a woman who runs...
 This video is for you.
 ---
 Boodchoo, weekend speaker lately...

126.Name: Making of a PW
126.Author: Qkrch
126.Description:
This is a 45 minutes documentary movie about the development of a persistent world for Neverwinter Nights 2. A developers team of the spanish pw Cielos Oscuros meet after a year of hard work to show their results, using the toolset, discussing about their goals and most of all having fun.

Even the DMs are human!

The video is subtitled in english and use Divx code (my english can be painful, sorry).

Thanks a lot to all the Cielos Oscuros team that provided the feeling about taking part of a nwn2 hard project and keep supporting me after this video release.

No badgers or gnomes were harmed on the making of this film.


PS: uploading to a streaming site too.

127.Name: We Awaken
127.Author: Darkbolt Melesk
127.Description:
The Fires of war call our name, Like the whistle of the wind through the tree's. We AWAKEN!! and we hunger. The taste of war so sweet, The bitter cry of defeat is muffled under our feet.

 The legendary army of old awakes...IS..no longer cold.

-Darkbolt Melesk-
**The Great sorcerer's speach to his army** :01/14/03

128.Name: NWN2: Mysteries of Westgate at IGN
128.Author: Ossian Studios
128.Description:
Today we're starting off an entire week of videos showing off the new Neverwinter Nights 2 adventure pack, Mysteries of Westgate. The new game features loads of new content for the NWN2 crowd, including new companions, a new sewer environment, loads of new monsters, and all the usual bells and whistles that made the presentation of the previous game so compelling.

In this adventure Ossian Studios takes the Neverwinter Nights 2 experience to the notorious city of Westgate where players will find themselves drawn into a bitter battle between rival groups within the city, including the mysterious criminal organization known as the Nights Masks. As the players try to find their way through this battle and uncover the secrets of a powerful but cursed treasure, they'll have the option to explore many side quests and decide which of the factions really have their best interests at heart.

We'll be bringing new videos to you all through the week and will also bring you an interview with the team, so keep checking back!

138.Name: 26 Dwarves versus 45 Orcs
138.Author: Frank Perez (a.k.a. Elysius)
138.Description:
This is a video demo of a battlefield AI routine that I am developing in NWN2. The battle shown here is between a company of dwarves and a larger company of orcs. The features of the AI demonstrated in this video are the following:

 Soldiers falling in formation at the start of the game

 Units marching (somewhat sporadically) in formation

 Each squad fighting as a (mostly) coordinated unit

 Soldiers becoming frightened and running off the map when they fail their morale check

There is still quite a bit of work to be done with this AI routine. For example, I have not implemented any fancy maneuvers such as flanking. In addition, I haven't coded any routine for unit commanders to try to rally their troops. Also, the in-game frame rate when there are too many soldiers in the area is bad. I'll have to figure out what the maximum number of NPCs should be to maintain a minimum frame rate of, say, 15 per second. Nevertheless, the video demonstrates what is possible with the NWN2 engine.

Music Credits
"Sarcophagus Unsealed" by Troy Sterling Nies
"Battle 2" by Steven Kelly

Disclaimer: The images shown in this page were not taken from the video. The images and the video were taken separately over several game sessions of the same module.

139.Name: Seahaven sneak peak
139.Author: Merecraft
139.Description: I have put together a sneak peak at some of the external areas of the city I have been working on for my Seahaven mod for NWN2. This is not a trailer for the mod - there is no plot or conversation details, and the editing is perfunctory at best; but it will give you a sense of the city itself.

141.Name: NWN2: Mysteries of Westgate Intro Trailer
141.Author: Ossian Studios
141.Description:
Here's the NWN2: Mysteries of Westgate intro from the upcoming adventure pack that will be available as a paid download from Atari.

Created by Atari and some of the most prominent members of the Neverwinter Nights 2 communities, Neverwinter Nights 2: Mysteries of Westgate provides hours of additional entertainment with all new engrossing storylines, professional voice acting, enchanting musical scores, new in-game content, and much more. Set in the infamous Forgotten Realms city of Westgate, players find themselves in possession of a powerful but cursed treasure that threatens to destroy them. Linked to the underworld organization known as the Night Masks, the treasure will draw players into a city-spanning clash between warring factions.

Players must choose their allegiance in order to break the curse and ultimately uncover a plot that threatens Westgate itself. From the creators of the critically-acclaimed Neverwinter Nights module, Darkness over Daggerford, Neverwinter Nights 2: Mysteries of Westgate will feature a non-linear, open-ended single-player campaign with numerous side quests covering more than 15 hours of game play. Atari�s new Adventure Pack will also feature 3 new companions; an entirely new underground sewers tile set themed after the seedy underbelly of Westgate; a host of new monsters to do battle with, including some truly epic foes; an exciting new and original musical score; as well as thousands of new lines of professionally recorded dialogue.

142.Name: NWN2: Storm of Zehir Video Interview
142.Author: GameTrailers.com
142.Description:
Thanks to TheHawk for pointing out a video interview with Obsidian PR Producer, Matthew Rorie on GameTrailers.com all about the upcoming NWN2: Storm of Zehir expansion pack. The video features Matthew talking about the expansion and showing some footage including the new overland map system. I actually got to see a very early prototype of it during one of my trips to Obsidian and it's really cool. It's great to see that it'll now be available to all modders to include. 

Also during the video Matthew talks about the main new feature of the expansion where players will be able to create up to 4 characters for their party to control. So this a major step up from the companion system and you will be able to create whatever classes you want. He also explains that Zehir is a 4th edition D&D God even though the ruleset is still 3.5. Zehir is a the God of darkness, poison, snakes, who are worshipped by the Yuan-Ti, and are your main enemy.

The official campaign of the expansion will have you go from level 3 to 15 and the expansion should be out Q4 of this year. Definitely a great video to watch and you can also check out this thread on the official forums for more reactions.

144.Name: Trinity - Trailer #1
144.Author: E.C.Patterson
144.Description:
Instant streaming version now available.

New teaser trailer for Gaming Parents Studios' upcoming module: Into The Forgotten Realms: Trinity.

The mod is set in present-day (D&D 3.5) Shadowdale and Cormanthor. Here�s a bit of what it�s about:

A new threat has come to Faerun�s heartland, one that recalls the tragic events of a not so distant past� 

Back in 1356 DR, Lashan Aumersair, Lord of Scardale, launched a series of lightning attacks against his neighbors, guided by a foul dream of rulership over all Dalelands. 

Fortunately, the tyrant was stopped just in time. 

But one man has now surfaced, who apparently seeks to succeed where Lashan failed. 

You, along with a few other adventurers, have been selected to hunt down the man behind this new threat and put a stop to his frightening plans. 

This chase will take you under the dark canopy of Cormanthor forest, to the outskirts of the legendary city of Myth Drannor, to plunge far underground, into what remains of one of the fabled schools of wizardry.

An adventure that will take you deep� Into the Forgotten Realms.

Here too is a new screenshot gallery.

If you�d like to find out more about ItFR: Trinity, please visit our blog.

145.Name: Senderos de Jade - Próximamente
145.Author: Ankhalas
145.Description:
Video que muestra algunas de las zonas de nuestro PW oriental para Nwn2. Me he dejado muchas por visualizar, ya que por razones de trama o por la duración del video no se han grabado.

Si hay tiempo este será el primer video de una serie que mostrará también los sistemas que usaremos al jugar (crafting, navegación, habilidades entrenables, pesca, medicina, etc), los nuevos modelos 3D y hechizos usados en batallas, y una introducción que usaremos para mostrar la historia inicial del servidor.

Esperamos que os guste,

Un saludo de parte de todo el equipo de Senderos de Jade.

151.Name: King for a Day Episode  I Trailer
151.Author: Qkrch
151.Description:
This will be my first single player module after 6 years developing with the NWN platform in different enviroments: King for a Day.

"Episode I: Summer" will be the first module of the campaign and the most action-based of the series where you be able to start as a simple soldier or a hero in a darkened plot of the Elenya continent.

This module was created by Qk and the CO-Team and it's based on the Cielos Oscuros story and PW which soon will have 6 years of life because of NWN.

As we always played in spanish, we want to share our world with the world :), so this module will be released in Spanish and later in English, so everyone can enjoy the beatiful works of the CO-Team and some new custom content made for this campaign.

Pointing release:
Spanish : October
English : November/December

155.Name: NWN2 Official Launch Video
155.Author: Obsidian
155.Description:
Launch trailer for NWN2 Storm of Zehir expansion!

NEW YORK, NY � November 18, 2008 � Atari and Wizards of the Coast, a subsidiary of Hasbro, Inc. (NYSE:HAS), bring new action and adventure into retailers today with the release of Neverwinter Nights� 2: Storm of Zehir. Developed by world-renowned studio Obsidian Entertainment, the second expansion pack for the acclaimed Neverwinter Nights 2 delivers thrilling original D&D® adventures made even more exciting by a host of new gameplay features. Rated �T� for Teens, Neverwinter Nights� 2: Storm of Zehir is now available for the suggested price of $29.99.

Neverwinter Nights 2: Storm of Zehir builds on the strong tradition of Dungeons & Dragons computer games by marrying old-school concepts like full party customization and dungeon crawling with new innovations, such as a fully 3D Overland Map feature which allows for free exploration of the non-linear game world. The gripping storyline foreshadows the events that devastate the land of the Forgotten Realms in the Fourth Edition of the Dungeons & Dragons Role-Playing Game released in June 2008. 

The Neverwinter Nights 2: Storm of Zehir Overland Map feature lets players explore the Chultan Peninsula and Sword Coast in a way never before possible in any Neverwinter Nights game. Players will explore well-known locations, like Neverwinter and Crossroad Keep, alongside lesser travelled areas, such as the xenophobic jungle nation of Samarach. Vicious monsters and groups of bandits populate the Overland Map, and the farther from civilization the player roams, the more difficult the encounters become. 

The 20 to 30-hour campaign in Neverwinter Nights 2: Storm of Zehir introduces new classes, including the fearsome Hellfire Warlock and the daring Swashbuckler, as well as brand-new spells, creatures, and playable races. Fans of the compelling multiplayer features of Neverwinter Nights 2 will be able to play through Storm of Zehir's campaign in the online cooperative mode, while modders can use the included editor to create their own campaigns and Overland Maps to share online.
